bibl.title: The Early Coinage of Hadrian and the Deified Trajan at Rome and Alexandria.
bibl.note: Hadrian's Adoption. - Mint of Rome: Early Coinage of Hadrian. - Mint of Rome: Gold Coinage of the Deified Trajan. - Mint of Alexandria: Early Coinage of Hadrian. - Mint of Alexandria: Coinage of Posthumous Trajan. - Conclusion. - Pp. 476-477: Appendix. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Andrew Burnett, The Early Coinage of Hadrian and the Deified Trajan at Rome and Alexandria.

Hadrian's Adoption. - Mint of Rome: Early Coinage of Hadrian. - Mint of Rome: Gold Coinage of the Deified Trajan. - Mint of Alexandria: Early Coinage of Hadrian. - Mint of Alexandria: Coinage of Posthumous Trajan. - Conclusion. - Pp. 476-477: Appendix. - Avec résumé en anglais.
